name: PhotonVERSE
description:
is a puzzle precision 2d platformer set in a neon universe.
play 100 stages through 10 themed worlds each with its own mechanics such as teleporters , reverse gravity , or even parallel worlds and many more.
PhotonVERSE have 3 game modes Free play, time attack and jump attack.
The game will grow bigger after its release by adding new elements such as leader boards ,new worlds , new mods etc.


  • 10 worlds to explore each with its own unique mechanics.
Reverse gravity

Pinball

Let it snow

  • 100 Stages
  • 3 Game modes
  • Puzzle Mode
  • Time Attack
  • Jump Attack
  • Puzzle elements
  • Challenge stages with weekly rotation
  • Constant free updates with new additions
  • Original Synthwave/Retrowave music
  • Crystal clear 4k graphics
  • Controller supported
